---
params:
  directory: '../log'
---


```{r setup}
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
library(ggplot2)
library(feather)
library(data.table)
```

```{r load data}
source('datasrc.cat.R')
df <- datasrc.cat.load(params$directory)
```

```{r}
df_ <- df %>% filter(
  as.POSIXct("2017-04-30 07:37", tz = "UTC") <= time,
  #time <= as.POSIXct("2017-04-30 07:37", tz = "UTC"),
  num.entities > 100
) %>%
  mutate(base_time = floor(as.numeric(time) / 5)) %>%
  group_by(base_time) %>%
  summarize(
    n = n(),
    num.entities = mean(num.entities),
    mem.used = sum(mem.used)
  ) %>%
  filter(n - lag(n, order_by = base_time) >= 0)
#g <- ggplot(df, aes(x = num.entities, y = mem.used.redis, color = member)) + geom_point() + geom_line()
```
